attributes.review: i WISH i could leave a 0 star review but sadly that isn’t a thing😔. this is the WORST app i have ever downloaded, i downloaded it because i felt that i needed to know when the next covid-fun rally was. once i opened the app, i was greeted by donald. after searching and searching for the next rally covid-fun rally, i found that there weren’t any near me! and was also informed that there wouldn’t be any massive orgies where we were able to get covid! only ones where covid was not allowed :( i am very disappointed. very bad app
attributes.title: very bad

attributes.review:
Basically, yesterday afternoon i was watering💦 my pool when I get an ad📱 for this app. I was curious🤔 so I downloaded it. Little did I know, when I opened the app, I saw a log in screen with a cheeto🥕 in the background standing behind the american flag🇺🇸 . I was FLABBERGASTED😨. I threw my purple IPhone 11, luckily my fish🐠 caught it. But in that moment right there, was the moment I knew this app was no good and I had to delete it immediately❌. I am now writing a review for this DISGOSTING🤢 app. Thank you for hearing my story, and yes, I am doing better😌. 

Yours truly, 
Lil’ Snowflake❄️🥰
attributes.title: THIS APP ALMOST MADE ME DROWN😱😱

attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app, i was so surprised! i didn’t expect rats to come flooding in through my toilet. it was extremely inconvenient for me and my family. we only survived to to my incredible samurai skills. my house is in shambles and i expect compensation for the damages done. also, i request that the trump administration pay for my family’s medical bills due to the rat bites. i do NOT request downloading this atrocious app unless, you wish to be infected with a deadly disease called rabies. thank you for your time.
attributes.title: this app is HORRIBLE🍊🍊

attributes.review: For the people who don’t know this idiot is banning all Chinese apps including TikTok TikTok is the most used app and there banning it in the US why would you do this What are we gonna do play outside oh wait no corona is still here there are so many people we look up and it’s not just dancing there’s life hacks helping people with depression or something else please don’t ban TikTok I’ve been on the app for four years and if you ban TikTok no one will vote for you there’s billions of people on this app you took it way to far so DON’T BAN TIKTOK
attributes.title: You ban TikTok we ban you

attributes.review: I tried to download this app in 2016 and it took the ENTIRE 4 years to download! And once it finally did download it took the entire month of March to open. In the time I was waiting, I bought ALL the tickets to his rally’s I could, but I couldn’t go because I was waiting for the app to load! And now when I open the app it makes a HORRIBLE ringing sound and it glitches 24/7. I think it has to do with the creator of the app, it shows how inconsistent and slow he is. This app NEEDS to be taken down!
attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review: i downloaded this amazing app after going to trump country with a bunch of old white people that changed my political views to the amazing racist orange in office🥰😍 unfortunately so, the app took 3 days to download and random oranges wearing toupees kept popping up all over my screen💥💥💥 this gave me a massive headache so i went to the doctors and im now brain dead!?!??? WHAT!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO HAVE COMMON SENSE AND AT LEAST HALF A BRAIN!! PLS IM BEGGING YOU🌪🌪🌪 anywho my dog also got ticks after i downloaded the app and i think the scary orange man gave them to him bcs i saw bugs crawling out of his toupee😖😖😖👁👅👁
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took soooo long to download and once it finally did, my screen kept glitching and my phone was turning off over and over again without me pressing any buttons. I didn’t think it was the app I thought it was something bigger inside my phone so I went to get it repaired then the worker at the apple store told me it was this app and that it should be deleted off of my phone and off of the appstore completely because it RUINS people’s phones with viruses of all sorts.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
